doc.title: Steppin' Out: Latin
doc.plot: Latin Dancing is fun and exciting! This program takes you from the syncopated Cha-Cha, to the flirtatious Rumba, the intoxicating Samba to the sensual Bolero, finishing with the rapid-fire footwork of the Mambo. The professional demonstrations show the finished product, but the curriculum teaches you how it's done. For the beginner it is a tool to get started, the intermediate dancer will learn new steps and style and the advanced dancer will add the finishing touches of technique that are necessary to complete your look.
